data.Name: Jerry Joseph
data.Bio: Jerry is a prolific songwriter and excellent guitarist. He's got a very recognizable gravelly voice, and sings with it amazingly well. He plays in bands and solo. His style started as reggae-tinged rock, evolved into straight-ahead rock. His acoustic side is folk. Lyrics very well-written and introspective. Short history: mid-80s to 1993: Leader of band Little Women Several short-lived bands 1995-on: Leader of The Jackmormons 2001-on: Leader of Stockholm Syndrome Read more on Last.fm
